introduction: Beren Saat was born on 26-02-1984 in the state of Ankara, Turkey. She is a Turkish Television Actress, Film Actress, Voice Artist & Philanthropist. She has won two Golden Butterfly Awards and is one of the highest-paid actresses from Turkey.Beren Saat was born and raised in a Muslim family from Turkey. She completed her school level education at TED Ankara College High School. For graduation,she enrolled at the Baskent University and obtained her Business Administration degree from there. During her time in university, she once participated in the famous TV competition TürkiyeninYildizlari and ended up being finished runner-up in the competetion.She then started getting various offers and appeared in various commercials before finally making her television debut through renowned series Askimizda Ölüm Var in which she played Ece Uslu's sister role. In the year 2004, she featured in Askimizda Ölüm Var and a year later in 2005, she played her first lead role in the series called Aska Sürgün. She then became a household name in Turkey after her performance as Yasemin Ünsal in Tomris Giritlioglu's. Few years later in the year 2008, she again reunited with Giritlioglu in the much acclaimed film titled Güz Sancisi (Pains of Autumn). She won Golden Butterfly Awards under the category of Best Actress for 2 years in a row.She as highly active personality from 2010 to 2015 and gave some of the most memorable performances of her career. She during this period also surpassed various other Turkish actresses and became one of the highest paid actresses in the country. In addition to acting, she has also been associated with various charitable organizations and has helped them raise money for various causes. She also donates a large chunk of own earned proceeds into charity.In 2004, she was cast as Nermin in the TV series Askimizda Ölüm Var.
